author: samwilsn
content: Would anyone mind if we try and get the immutable state PR in next? I feel like it's probably one of the bad ones for rebasing.

content: go ahead. I encountered the mutation bug myself in the contract creation PR. So I think I can handle a rebase related to mutation.

author: voith
content: <@!497280885645639691> Something I forgot to mention on the call. I ended up implementing the `RETURN` opcode in my PR in order to get the tests to pass.
